title: Promise.all()
description: The `Promise.all()` static JS method takes an iterable of `Promise` objects and returns a single `Promise` object that resolves with an array of results when all the promises in the iterable have resolved.
content: The static method that takes an iterable of promises and, once all of them have resolved, returns a single `Promise` object that resolves to an array of their results. If any promise in the iterable rejects, the returned `Promise` object immediately rejects with the reason from the first rejection.
